calls.title: Initial Discovery Call with Acme Corp
calls.transcript:
Sarah: Thanks for joining the call today. To start, could you tell me a bit more about the challenges you're facing with your current lead generation process?
Client: We're struggling to keep track of incoming leads and our sales team often misses follow-ups.
nextSteps: Send follow-up email with product demo link.
Schedule a technical deep-dive for next week.

calls.title: Q3 Business Review - Stark Industries
calls.transcript:
John: Welcome, everyone. The main goal for today is to review our performance in Q3 and align on priorities for Q4.
Client: We're happy with the results but we've seen a dip in engagement on the new platform.
nextSteps: Prepare a proposal for a new training module.

calls.title: Pricing Negotiation - Wayne Enterprises
calls.transcript:
Emily: Based on your usage and the features you need, this is the pricing tier we recommend.
Client: That's higher than we budgeted for. Is there any flexibility on the annual subscription cost?
nextSteps: Discuss discount options with sales manager.
Provide a revised quote by EOD Friday.

calls.title: Onboarding & Implementation Kick-off
calls.transcript:
Sarah: We're so excited to have you on board! Let's walk through the implementation plan to ensure a smooth start.
Client: This looks great. We're eager to get started.
nextSteps: Grant team access to the platform.
Schedule first check-in for 2 weeks out.

calls.title: Feature Request Discussion - Cyberdyne Systems
calls.transcript:
John: Thanks for sharing your feedback. Could you elaborate on the AI-powered reporting feature you mentioned?
Client: We want a dashboard that automatically identifies at-risk customers based on their usage patterns.
nextSteps: Log feature request in the product backlog.
Connect client with the product manager for a detailed discussion.
